item.title: Learning Go
item.description: We’ve been making the transition from Java to Go at my workplace for the last year or so. We write web applications and Java has been a good language to use with its powerful frameworks (EJB, JPA), tooling and 3rd party libraries. It is a heavy language, however. A lot of development time was taken up with long compile times and complicated deployments, and the occassional dependency hell (lookin’ at you Xerces).
